mapper.sql: id as id , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , status as status , resourceId as resourceId , resourceActionId as resourceActionId , roleId as roleId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sss_role_resource ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resourceId, resourceActionId, roleId ) VALUES ( #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{resourceId}, #{resourceActionId}, #{roleId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE sss_role_resource
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
resourceId = #{resourceId},
resourceActionId = #{resourceActionId},
roleId = #{roleId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE sss_role_resource
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
resourceId = #{map.resourceId},
resourceActionId = #{map.resourceActionId},
roleId = #{map.roleId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sss_role_resource ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resourceId, resourceActionId, roleId ) VALUES ( #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.resourceId}, #{map.resourceActionId}, #{map.roleId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, creator
, createDate
, lastModifier
, lastModDate
, status
, resourceId
, resourceActionId
, roleId
FROM sss_role_resource
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND resourceId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.resourceId} , '%')
AND resourceActionId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.resourceActionId} , '%')
AND roleId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.roleId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
